trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: 在舊版 Windows 上啟動 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: 在舊版 Windows 上啟動 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This section explains how to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 本節說明如何在 [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] 上啟動 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: It also explains how to enable the optional feature for [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 它也會說明如何在 [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] 上啟用 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 中 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] 的選用功能。

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881).
trans-unit.target: 若要在支援的系統上安裝 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]，請下載並安裝 [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安裝 Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md)。

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: 若要在支援的系統上安裝 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]，請下載並安裝 [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安裝 Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md)。

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: 如何在舊版 Windows 上啟動 [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start the installed version of [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], where applicable.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列任何方法來啟動已安裝的 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 版本 (適用時)。

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: 從 [開始] 功能表

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 **[開始]**，並輸入 **PowerShell**，然後按一下 **[Windows PowerShell]**。

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: 從 **[開始]** 功能表中，依序按一下 **[開始]**、**[所有程式]**、**[附屬應用程式]**、**[Windows PowerShell]** 資料夾和 **[Windows PowerShell]**。

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: 在命令提示字元中

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: 在 Cmd.exe、[!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE 中，若要啟動 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)]，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: You can also use the parameters of the PowerShell.exe program to customize the session.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 PowerShell.exe 程式的參數來自訂工作階段。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [PowerShell.exe Command-Line Help](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PowerShell.exe 命令列說明](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md)。

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: 使用系統管理權限 ([以系統管理員身分執行])

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 **[開始]**、輸入 **PowerShell**、以滑鼠右鍵按一下 **[Windows PowerShell]**，然後按一下 **[以系統管理員身分執行]**。

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: 如何在舊版 Windows 上啟動 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使用下列任何方法來啟動 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: 從 [開始] 功能表

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 **[開始]**，並輸入 **ISE**，然後按一下 **[Windows PowerShell ISE]**。

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: 從 **[開始]** 功能表中，依序按一下 **[開始]**、**[所有程式]**、**[附屬應用程式]**、**[Windows PowerShell]** 資料夾和 **[Windows PowerShell ISE]**。

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: 在命令提示字元中

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: 在 Cmd.exe、[!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE 中，若要啟動 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)]，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: 使用系統管理權限 ([以系統管理員身分執行])

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell ISE**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 **[開始]**、輸入 **ISE**、以滑鼠右鍵按一下 **[Windows PowerShell ISE]**，然後按一下 **[以系統管理員身分執行]**。

trans-unit.source: How to Enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: 如何在舊版 Windows 上啟用 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on all versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 中，預設會在 Windows 的所有版本上啟用 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If it is not already enabled, Windows Management Framework 4.0 or [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] enables it.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未啟用，則 Windows Management Framework 4.0 或 [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] 會啟用它。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 中，預設會在 [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)] 上啟用 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], it is an optional feature.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在 [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] 上，它是選用功能。

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] 上啟用 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 中的 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)]，請使用下列程序。

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: 啟用 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: 啟動 [伺服器管理員]。

trans-unit.source: Click **Features** and then click **Add Features**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 **[功能]**，然後按一下 **[新增功能]**。

trans-unit.source: In Select Features, click [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在 [選取功能] 中，按一下 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]。
